name: Habitabilidad Ruido
description: Simulation of a program to determine the habitability of a building based on the levels and propagation of noise in the spaces mentioned.

name: Flutter-App
description: This repository contains the All-in-one desktop app for task management, document organization and Post-it style notes.

name: ArtesaniasBGA
description: It is an e-commerce platform that will enable online shopping, integrate inventories with physical stores, and analyze customer behavior. It uses a layered, event-based system architecture.

name: Visenture
description: Visenture is a comprehensive investment management and stock trading application designed to simulate real-time stock market trading. It allows users to buy and sell stocks, manage their portfolios, and access market analysis.
